sentences.sContent: The clever girl bore off the first prize.
sentences.sContent_eng: The clever girl bore off the first prize.
sentences.sCn: 这个聪明的女孩得了一等奖。

sentences.sContent: The names of those two scientists are bracketed for the first prize.
sentences.sContent_eng: The names of those two scientists are bracketed for the first prize.
sentences.sCn: 那两位科学家都被提名授予一等奖。
